column2: # Filter out records with missing coordinates
# Create the leaflet map with marker clustering, a scale bar, and a reset button.
addProviderTiles("CartoDB.Positron") %>%  # Clean, light base map recommended for clarity
clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions()  # Clusters markers to improve load performance
addScaleBar(position = "bottomleft") %>%  # Adds a scale bar for reference
